identificationPageComponent.TITLE: Register your account
identificationPageComponent.INSTRUCTIONS: Manage your subscriptions, payment methods and set up your streaming login â€” just a few things you can do when you register your SiriusXM Account.
identificationPageComponent.UNEXPECTED_ERROR: We're sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.

selectAccountAndVerifyComponent.TITLE_MULTIPLE_ACCOUNTS: We found some accounts that match your info.
selectAccountAndVerifyComponent.TITLE: We found an account that matched your info.
selectAccountAndVerifyComponent.NOTE_MULTIPLE_ACCOUNTS: Choose the account you would like to verify

ACCOUNT_LOOKUP_MODAL.TITLE: Let's find your account.
ACCOUNT_LOOKUP_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: Use one of the account lookup options below.

STEP_EMAIL.TITLE: Confirm email
STEP_EMAIL.INSTRUCTIONS: Thanks for verifying your account, {{firstName}}. Confirm or enter a new email address that you want to link to your account.
STEP_EMAIL.ERROR_MESSAGE: A valid email address is required.

STEP_PHONE_NUMBER.TITLE: Confirm phone number
STEP_PHONE_NUMBER.INSTRUCTIONS: Confirm or enter a new phone number that you want to link to your account.
STEP_PHONE_NUMBER.ERROR_MESSAGE: A valid phone number is required.

STEP_SECURITY_QUESTIONS.TITLE: Create security questions
STEP_SECURITY_QUESTIONS.PRE_INSTRUCTIONS: Thank you for verifying your account, {{firstName}}.
STEP_SECURITY_QUESTIONS.INSTRUCTIONS: Select three questions you want to use to access your account if you forget your password.

STEP_USERNAME_AND_PASSWORD.TITLE: Create username and password
STEP_USERNAME_AND_PASSWORD.INSTRUCTIONS: You can use these credentials to manage and recover your account.

STEP_PASSWORD.TITLE: Create password
STEP_PASSWORD.INSTRUCTIONS: Simply create a password to finish your account registration for {{email}}.

COMPLETED.TITLE: Thanks for registering, {{firstName}}.
COMPLETED.INSTRUCTIONS: You can manage your account online, as well as listen on your phone, computer, smart TV, speakers, and more with the SXM App.

accountLookupPageComponent.TITLE: No account found
accountLookupPageComponent.SUBTITLE: Let's try something else. Enter your Radio ID or Account Number to find your account.

UiLookupByRadioIdOrAccountNumberComponen.RADIO_LABEL: How do I find my Radio ID?
UiLookupByRadioIdOrAccountNumberComponen.TOOLTIP: Your Radio ID will be either 8 or 12 digits.
UiLookupByRadioIdOrAccountNumberComponen.ERROR_ACCOUNT_CANNOT_BE_VERIFIED: There's a problem preventing registration of your account. Please chat with an agent for help.
UiLookupByRadioIdOrAccountNumberComponen.RADIO_UNBRANDED_ERROR: This radio cannot currently be managed online. If you purchased your vehicle within the last seven days, this could be because we haven't yet received information about the sale. For immediate help, please chat with an agent or call Listener Care at 1-888-601-6271.
UiLookupByRadioIdOrAccountNumberComponen.RADIO_ID_INVALID: The Radio ID you entered does not match our records. Please try again or chat with an agent.
UiLookupByRadioIdOrAccountNumberComponen.ACCOUNT_NUMBER_ERROR: The number entered does not match our records. Please try again or chat with an agent.

HelpFindRadioIdModalComponent.RADIO_LINK_SUBTITLE: How do I find my Radio ID?
HelpFindRadioIdModalComponent.RADIO_LINK_INSTRUCTIONS:
Tune your radio dial to channel 0 and the radio ID should display.

For some Sirius radios, you will need to press and hold down the SAT or ESN button, or access your radio's menu functions.
HelpFindRadioIdModalComponent.RADIO_LINK_SIRIUS_LINK_TEXT: Get more help for Sirius radios
HelpFindRadioIdModalComponent.RADIO_LINK_MARINE_AVIATIONS_LINK: Get help for Marine and Aviation devices

LookupYourMarineOrAviationDeviceModalCom.TITLE: Lookup your Marine or Aviation Device ID
LookupYourMarineOrAviationDeviceModalCom.MESSAGE: There are a few places you can look to find your Radio ID or ESN.
LookupYourMarineOrAviationDeviceModalCom.NOTE: Note: Radio IDs are 8 digits and letters, and ESN's are 12 digits.

UNORDERED_LIST.item-1: For most devices, access your Diagnostics or Settings menu, and then look for your ESN/Radio ID/Device ID to be listed.
UNORDERED_LIST.item-2: Additionally, on many devices you may also look on the bottom of the device, or the packaging that it came with for the Radio ID. In many cases, you may find it next to the serial number of the device.
UNORDERED_LIST.item-3: If your device also has audio capability, you may be able to tune to channel 0 and it will display your Radio ID.
UNORDERED_LIST.item-4: If you are still having trouble, you can call your manufacturer and ask them to provide you with your Radio ID.

CNAComponent.TITLE: We found your car.
CNAComponent.DESCRIPTION: You just need to finish registering your account before you can start listening

accountAlreadyRegisteredComponent.TITLE: This account is already registered.
accountAlreadyRegisteredComponent.DESCRIPTION: You can go to the sign in page to log in to your account, find your username or reset your password.
